scripts.build:aot:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 BUILD_AOT=1 SOURCE_MAP=0 yarn run config:prod && yarn rimraf dist compiled www && yarn run webpack:prod --config config/webpack.prod.js --progress --profile --bail

scripts.build:docker: yarn run build:prod && docker build -t angular-webpack-starter:latest .
scripts.clean:all: yarn rimraf doc coverage dist compiled webpack-cache
scripts.clean: yarn cache verify && yarn rimraf node_modules doc coverage dist compiled webpack-cache
